text: are you a muffin for breakfast kind of

rolled oats and a half a teaspoon of
coarse salt if we're using say fine salt
use a quarter teaspoon because coarse
salt is much less salty just because the

spoon so make sure that if you're using
a table salt just reduce the salt by at
least 1/2 then add 6 tablespoons of cold
unsalted butter and you can work this

and I think they'll be super happy that
